results.name: 3*A002024 - 2*A051340.
comment: Row sums = the hexagonal numbers, A000384: (1, 6, 15, 28, 45,...).

Table T(n,k)=n+3*k-3,  n, k > 0, read by antidiagonals. General case A209304. Let m be natural number. The first column of the table T(n,1) is the sequence of the natural numbers A000027. Every next column is formed from previous shifted by m elements.
For m=0 the result is A002260,
for m=1 the result is A002024,
for m=2 the result is A128076,
for m=3 the result is A131914,
for m=4 the result is A209304. (End)
link: Boris Putievskiy, Transformations [Of] Integer Sequences And Pairing Functions, arXiv preprint arXiv:1212.2732, 2012.
